data.text: Imvani Inu Yehova pempho langa lachilungamo;
Ngakhale Inu mutafufuza mtima wanga ndi kundisanthula usiku,
Mayendedwe anga akhazikika pa njira zanu;
Ine ndikuyitana Inu, Mulungu wanga, pakuti mudzandiyankha;
Onetsani kudabwitsa kwa chikondi chanu chachikulu,
kuchoka kwa oyipa amene amandizinga ine,
Iwo amatseka mitima yawo yopanda chifundo,
Iwo ali ngati mkango wofuna nyama;
Dzukani Yehova, mulimbane nawo ndipo muwagwetse pansi;
Inu Yehova, pulumutseni ndi dzanja lanu kwa anthu otere,
Ndipo ine m ºchilungamo ndidzaona nkhope yanu;
